org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.reinforce

Class EpisodicReinforceLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.reinforce.BasicReinforceGaussianLearner
      • org.hswgt.teachingbox.core.rl.reinforce.EpisodicReinforceLearner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, AgentObserver, ParameterObserver, Learner

    public class EpisodicReinforceLearner
extends BasicReinforceGaussianLearner
implements Serializable
    This class adapts an arbitrary parameter based on the return per episode (REINFORCE, Williams, 1992).
    Author:
    tokicm
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • EpisodicReinforceLearner

        public EpisodicReinforceLearner(ReinforceLearner rlearner,
                                double initMean,
                                double minMean,
                                double maxMean,
                                double initSD,
                                double minSD,
                                double maxSD,
                                double alpha)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        rlearner - The ReinforceLearner
        initMean - initial mean of exploration parameter (eg. epsilon, tau, sigma)
        minMean - minimum boundary of mean
        maxMean - maximum boundary of mean
        initSD - initial standard deviation
        minSD - minimum standard deviation
        maxSD - maximum standard deviation
        alpha - learning rate for mue and sigma (REINFORCE)
